name: UAE (ADGM)

typical_paths.label: ADGM manager + funds perimeter (informational)
bullets: ADGM funds and investment management are regulated; permissions depend on activities and client type.
Confirm FSRA rulebooks and any guidance applicable to the selected structure.

marketing_notes: Marketing depends on FSRA rules and client categorisation; cross-border promotion needs review.
Different rules may apply for onshore UAE vs ADGM.
